ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: Yaks are overrated. get me a good ox, or a strong horse any day ... From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) [mailto:Michael.Garramone@cox.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Yaks are overrated. get me a good ox, or a strong horse any day

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 4:54 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Great post on item balancing (Long)


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

yes no doubt but we were talking ratio only.

off subject, the waki is also much easier to get. i had 2 waki's a long
time before i ever saw a yak. actually i would never have gone after the
waki's but for the difficulty (and frustration of losing lottos) of getting
a yak.

Shada

>
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> But doesn't the Yak proc a 75pt DD? I would think that would
> far outweigh
> the miniscule difference in ratio.
>
> Kitasi
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 12:51 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Great post on item balancing (Long)
>
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> ahh, i was only going by delay/damage ratio. which is the same: 3.0
>
> Shada
>
>
> > From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
> >
> > > in my ever-annoying habit of correcting people, EBW is not
> > a better ratio
> > > than yak, it is the exact same ratio.
> >
> > At level 50 you can expect this:
> >
> > (7 * (50/10) + 1) / (21/10) = 17.14 dmg/sec max. EBW
> > (8 * (50/10) + 1) / (24/10) = 17.08 dmg/sec max. YAK
> >
> > So yes, the EBW has a better ratio, however small.
> > They are not exactly the same, as you have stated. =)
> >
> > Harmonic.
>
